name.description: The name of the new Angular workspace and root application.

directory.description: A directory name to create the workspace in. Defaults to `.schematics/<name>` when omitted.

routing.description: When true, generates a routing module.

style.description: The default stylesheet format for the project.

standalone.description: Generate the application bootstrapped using standalone APIs.

zendeskDisplayName.description: Display name for the generated Zendesk app.

zendeskAuthorName.description: Author name to record in the Zendesk app manifest.

zendeskAuthorEmail.description: Support or author email to record in the Zendesk app manifest.

zendeskDefaultLocale.description: Default locale to configure inside the Zendesk manifest and translations.

zendeskShortDescription.description: Override the short description used within Zendesk translations.

zendeskLongDescription.description: Override the long description used within Zendesk translations.
